note.p: Death: Cavan, County Cavan, Ireland (10 July 1842)
Education: Trinity College, Dublin. BA (1800), LLB (1805), LLD (1810)

Career: Called to the Bar in Ireland (1803); King's Counsel; MP for Dublin University (1807-1812); MP for Yarmouth, Isle of Wight (1816-1818); Baron of the Exchequer (1830); Judge of the Common Pleas (1842)
